attributes.action: Laise Better with the States and People of the Channel Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The People of the Channel Islands are tired of watching Britain's policies from the sidelines, and would like to actively be involved and to have an opinion over any British government policies which may involve the Channel Islands, either directly or indirectly. We have remained loyal to Queen and country, and now, we feel, as British citizens, that we are entitled to an opinion over any government decisions which may effect us. The British government needs to cooperate more with us.
